result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel K. Sullivan

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Conditions: 
No contact with anyone involved in illegal drug activities, except in a therapeutic setting. 
Defendant not to drive without a valid driver's license and IID installed. 
Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety. 
Comply with Pre-Trial Monitoring Services with possible testing based on monitoring level. 
(Covers 19CT422, 22CF1104)

(Cases 19CT422, 22CF1104 are called at 11:12 AM- by Zoom) Defendant Daniel Sullivan appears in custody via video conference from the Jail with Law Intern David Carlson supervised by Attorney Ryan Kohler. ADA Tiffany Winter appears in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Warrant is executed in 19CT422. Defense waives reading of the complaints. Defendant updates phone number and is eligible for Public Defender representation. Time limits for preliminary hearing in 22CF1104 are waived. 
Settlement Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on 10/24/2022 at 2:30 PM. 
Hearing: 11/17/2022 at 9:30 AM.

Conditions: 
No contact with anyone involved in illegal drug activities, except in a therapeutic setting. 
Defendant not to drive without a valid driver's license and IID installed. 
Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety. 
Comply with Pre-Trial Monitoring Services with possible testing based on monitoring level. 
(Covers 19CT422, 22CF1104)
